channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery

item.title: The surprising reason x-rays can push arthritis patients toward surgery
item.description: Knee osteoarthritis is a major cause of pain and disability, but routine X-rays often do more harm than good. New research shows that being shown an X...

item.title: Scientists found a new way to turn sunlight into fuel
item.description: A research team created a plant-inspired molecule that can store four charges using sunlight, a key step toward artificial photosynthesis. Unlike past...

item.title: How did a planet this big form around a star this small?
item.description: Astronomers have discovered a giant Saturn-sized planet orbiting TOI-6894, the smallest star ever known to host such a world. The finding overturns lo...

item.title: Rats walk again after breakthrough spinal cord repair with 3D printing

item.title: Scientists crack indole’s toughest bond with copper, unlocking new medicines
item.description: Scientists have cracked one of chemistry’s toughest challenges with indoles, using copper to unlock a spot once thought too stubborn to change. The di...
